page.title: 12NORTH STREET WELLINGTON
page.content: From the centre,taking the road to Milverton,is North Street.A few shops can be found at the start of the road ,an Optitians,2 Hairstylists,an Oriental Carpet Dealer,A mans shop,a Shoe Shop/Repairs,A Motorcycle Agents, a Tile Centre and a Childs Clothes Shop.Another entrance to the Carpark leaves this road,after which comes a Freezer Centre and a Butchers,the Wellington Police Station and the Fire Station.To the left is a small road leading to Beech Grove,and after this the road is lined with fairly old houses dating from 1900.This road becomes {Waterloo Road}and finaly joins{Station Road},coming from {Tonedale}. Waterloo road has two Public Houses and the Sports Centre branches off to the left.
